column2:
"<%me>.
And Matoi."
"...Xiao, we're in a hurry!"
"I know, to help out Sukunahime. You're going to Harkotan?"

"However, that is not allowed.
As Administrator of ARKS, I order
you to stay here."
"But... Why!?"
"Don't you think you are fighting too much?"

"Not just Darkers, but [Elder], [Loser], [Apprentice]
and [Double], from its own universe."
"And by doing so, you've absorbed their darkness. You could burst at any moment."
"But!"
"NO! DON'T YOU UNDERSTAND?"
"YOU MIGHT DIE!?"
"１．So, you want us to abandon them?"
"２．You want them to die, but not us?"
"...Saying it that way is unfair."
"...Xiao, we thank you for your concerns."
"But, we need to go help Sukunahime... We have to stop [Double]."

"<%me>!
Matoi!
I'm the Administrator of ARKS."

"I will not be lenient, even during an emergency.
Remember that..."
"...Please, be safe."
